page.title: 19DUCKS ON THE RIVER
page.content:
There are many ducks on the river Stour, and fish. I go fishing there every Saturday morning to catch tadpoles. Once I caught this creature that that was a stick but it moved. I never found out what it was because it died. Last Christmas we were fishing and three big swans came swimming down the river ready to take off over Iford Bridge and one swan got hit by a car bonnet. The driver drove on but we ran over to see if it was all right. It died so someone telephoned the RSPCA and they took it away. There are lots of different kinds of trees and bushes along the river bank which are very attractive to look at, the one I like best is a fallen tree because it is easy to climb.
Gemma Tubbs 1N1
